data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Saint Thomas.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint Thomas, Barbados
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Saint Thomas, Barbados that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Saint Thomas, Barbados a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Father, move the 4,812 believers in the state of Saint Thomas to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Welchman Hall
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Welchman Hall, Saint Thomas, Barbados.
Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Saint Thomas, Barbados. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Saint Thomas.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.section_summary:
the state of Saint Thomas, Barbados has a population of 14,300.

We estimate Saint Thomas has 4,812 people who might know Jesus, 8,431 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,057 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Saint Thomas, Barbados to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
